name: Angel Hair Braid
flavorText: “Death is preferable to the fate suffered by those who are taken by the Burning Hells, for theirs is an existence of misery and pain. If they could only strike back against those who imprisoned them, they would die contented.” -The Journals of Deckard Cain
flavorTextHtml: “Death is preferable to the fate suffered by those who are taken by the Burning Hells, for theirs is an existence of misery and pain. If they could only strike back against those who imprisoned them, they would die contented.” -The Journals of Deckard Cain

secondary.textHtml: Punish gains the effect of every rune. (Crusader Only)
